MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44 and CH45 postcode areas of Wallasey affecting properties in Mosslands Drive, Burton Avenue, Stonehouse Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:09am on 17th March 2021.
